inclusion.criterion: Gross income less than or equal to 200% federal poverty level
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Permission of health care provider if present with diabetes or previous CVD event
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Medical condition for which weight loss is contraindicated, e.g. malignancy or other
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Weight loss greater than 20 lbs in last 3 months
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any history of gastric bypass surgery, stomach stapling or liposuction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Planning to leave area before study period ends
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current participation in another clinical trial
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, is obese and mentally retarded. She is treating with GH without estrogen therapy.
